programme.title: Movie - Madhura Raja - EP 1
programme.desc: Raja, a lionhearted man, heads to a village to protect the people who are being terrorised by a local criminal and illegal liquor merchant, Nadeshan.

programme.title: Movie - Sarkarin Yelam - EP 1
programme.desc: Mahi lends a large sum to his deceitful lover in Miami, then uncovers a banking scandal while seeking repayment from her politician father in Vizag.

programme.title: Movie - Vaazh - EP 1
programme.desc: Vaazhl' is a film about inner search, through travel and journey to discover your true self.

programme.title: Movie - Savarakathi - EP 1
programme.desc: A barber has a bad encounter with a gangster on the road and this results in him running all over the city to save himself.

programme.title: Movie - Maragatha Naanayam - EP 1
programme.desc: A king received a blessed coin, the Maragadha Naanayam, granting him power. After his death, the coin causes a string of deaths. A man takes the challenge to retrieve it.

programme.title: Movie - Kolamavu Kokila - EP 1
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Movie - Veetla Vishesham - EP 1
programme.desc: Elango, a 26-year-old man, is shocked to learn his mother is pregnant. His struggle to accept the news strains his relationship with his girlfriend, Sowmya.

programme.title: Movie - Vadakupatty Ramasamy - EP 1
programme.desc: A selfish charlatan exploits his village's superstitions for profit. When his main income source is shut down, he desperately tries various ways to reopen the temple.

programme.title: Movie - Pathu Thala - EP 1
programme.desc: An undercover police officer embarks on a mission to capture a crime boss and rescue a politician. However, what he discovers forces him to rethink his views on good and evil.

programme.title: Movie - Miss Shetty Mister Polyshetty - EP 1
programme.desc: Miss Shetty is a feminist living in London and wants to be single forever. Mr. Polishetty from Hyderabad in Telangana, India, wants to be in a committed relationship.

programme.title: Movie - iSmart Shankar - EP 1
programme.desc: Shankar manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Kidayin Karunai Manu - EP 1
programme.desc: Ramamoorthy and his family are on their way to do a goat sacrifice in their temple. A series of hilarious events ensue when they see a road accident.

programme.title: Movie - Maamanithan - EP 1
programme.desc: A humble auto driver, desperate to improve the standard of education for his children, convinces a real estate agent that he will help him sellallhisplots.

programme.title: Movie - Tamilarasan - EP 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer gets in to a conflict with Rana. Their enmity worsens when Tamilarasan refuses to obey Rana's order in a critical situation.

programme.title: Movie - Thodarum - EP 1
programme.desc: A possessive wife, afraid of other women in her husband's life, wants to find a replacement for herself when she is diagnosed with a terminal heart condition.

programme.title: Movie - Nerkonda Paarvai - EP 1
programme.desc: A retired veteran lawyer returns to defend three women falsely accused in a criminal case, facing powerful enemies and patriarchal biases in court.

programme.title: Movie - Valimai - EP 1
programme.desc: A city's crime rate rises due to a notorious motorcycle club. When chaos ensues, police officer Arjun takes charge to restore law and order.

programme.title: Movie - Ippadikku Kadhal - EP 1
programme.desc: Two depressed souls from different regions who come together and find a connection. Their sadness starts to fade away as they spend time together, bringing happiness into their lives.

programme.title: Movie - Jawaan - EP 1
programme.desc: Driven by a vendetta to right societal wrongs, a man confronts a fearless outlaw who has caused immense suffering, while honoring a long-held promise.

programme.title: Movie - Coffee With Kadhal - EP 1

With historian and photographer Pierre Lahoud, we fly over the icebound Saint Lawrence, one of the world's most dangerous navigable waterways.

programme.title: Movie - Gajendra

programme.title: Movie - Allauddin

programme.title: Movie - Enaintha Kaikal

programme.title: Movie - Alex Pandian

programme.title: Movie - Nepaali
programme.desc: Karthik's wife Priya is being harassed by a police officer and as a result she ends her life. However, Karthik is held responsible for her death and imprisoned. While in prison, a social worker offers to help him and clear his name.

programme.title: Movie - Tholaipaesi
programme.desc: Veda continues his philandering ways even after his marriage to Anita. Things take a turn when she learns that her husband is having an affair with Reema.

programme.title: Movie - Thoodhu Po Chellakkiliye

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Volta a Catalunya is a road bicycle race held annually in Catalonia, Spain. It is one of three World Tour stage races in Spain, together with the Vuelta a Espaa and the Tour of the Basque Country. Raced over seven days, it covers the autonomous community of Catalonia in Northeast Spain and contains one or more stages in the mountain region of the Pyrenees. First held in 1911, the Volta a Catalunya is the fourth-oldest still-existing cycling stage race in the world.

programme.desc: The Maekyung Open is a professional golf tournament that takes place in Seongnam, Gyeonggi Province, South Korea. programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive 500,000 from a total prize fund of 2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 08/09
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2008/2009 season.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 17
programme.desc: Former Premier League stars select their dream teams from the best they played with or against, guiding us through their picks with stories from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: NETBUSTERS - EP 34
programme.desc: Relive the best action from the Premier League with this fast-paced ISO angle highlights show, featuring every game and every goal from each matchround.

programme.title: THE CATCH-UP SHOW - EP 37
programme.desc: All the very best of the week's programming and digital content from another action-packed Premier League match round.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 48
programme.desc: Reggae Rhythms in the Premier League explores the powerful connection between Jamaica and the world's most-watched football league, showcasing how the island's culture, music, and style have influenced the Premier League. We feature iconic Jamaican players who have left their mark, while also diving into the impact of reggae music, fashion, and fan culture on the game.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 38
programme.desc: He was a Gunner through and through, from academy level to the first team, Emile Smith Rowe lived his dream of playing for Arsenal, the club he grew up supporting. Now at Fulham and injury-free, the 24-year-old is enjoying a new lease of life in West London. In this week's Big Interview, Smith Rowe talks about his journey from grassroots to becoming a pro, what his parents had to sacrifice to help achieve his dream, as well as the difficult decision to leave Arsenal to further his career.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 19
programme.desc: Still the only team in Premier League history to throw away a 12-point lead, Les Ferdinand tells the story of Newcastle's agonising Run-In, where Kevin Keegan's side were pipped to the title by Manchester United.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 45
programme.desc: PL Stories takes a look at the forgotten moments that truly defined a Premier League season, offering new perspectives on the games that shaped title races. As the season nears its conclusion, two former Premier League players alongside two football experts revisit iconic yet often overlooked moments, such as Steven Gerrard's infamous slip in 2014, which many believe ended Liverpool's title charge.

programme.title: PL RIVALRIES - EP 1
programme.desc: Former Premier League stars Gary Cahill and John Barnes join Manish Bhasin to relive some of the biggest clashes between Chelsea and Liverpool, ultimately picking their all-time combined XI from these two Premier League giants.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 15/16
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2015/2016 season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Igeu Kabesa vs. Humphrey Mulenga
programme.desc: In this episode Igeu 'Smiley' Kabesa meets Humphrey 'King Cobra' Mulenga for the World Lightweight Championship.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Paul Williams vs. Verno Phillips
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Junior Middleweights Paul "The Punisher" Williams (35-1, 26 KOs) and Verno Phillips (42-10, 21 KOs) as they battle for the vacant WBO Interim Belt at the Citizens Business Bank Arena in Ontario, California, USA, on November 29, 2008.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Edison Miranda vs. Willie Gibbs
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Super Middleweights Edison Miranda (26-2, 23 KOs) vs. Willie 'The Gladiator' Gibbs (20-1, 16 KOs) from the Miccosukee Indian Gaming Resort in Miami, Florida, USA. Bonus coverage includes Jason Litzau, aka 'The American Boy' (20-1, 18 KOs) vs. Jose Hernandez (21-3, 13 KOs).

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Michael Katsidis
programme.desc: This episode features lightweight champion Juan Manuel Marquez defending against Michael Katsidis, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paulie Malignaggi vs. Lovemore N'Dou
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Paulie Malignaggi challenging Lovemore N'Dou for the IBF world super lightweight title. Malignaggi looks for a dominating performance to launch him into bouts with boxing superstars such as Ricky Hatton, Juan Diaz and Zab Judah.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Hugo Hernan Garay
programme.desc: With the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Huck (33-1) defends against veteran contender Hugo Garay (34-6) at the Olympia Eissportzentrum in Munich, Germany. Huck, fighting in his adoptive home country, was making the 7th consecutive defense of his championship.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Oscar De La Hoya vs. Mike Grable
programme.desc: This edition highlights a bout early in the career of "The Golden Boy", fresh off his gold medal winning performance in the Olympic Games, as Oscar De La Hoya competes in just his 6th professional fight taking on 13-1-2 Mike Grable. De La Hoya had knocked out his first five opponents to start his illustrious career, and had his sights set on a World Championship less than two years after his debut. First, he would have to get passed Grable of Clarkston, Michigan, hoping for a historic upset.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Carlos Baldomir vs. Vernon Forrest
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Carlos Baldomir and Vernon Forrest facing off to determine the new WBC super welterweight world champion, a fight that earns both fighters an ovation at the end.

programme.title: WCCB Canelo Alvarez vs. Caleb Plant
programme.desc: The Undisputed Super Middleweight World Championship is on the line as Canelo Alvarez defends his WBA, WBC, and WBO Super Middleweight World Championship titles against Caleb Plant, while attempting to claim the IBF World Title to become Undisputed Champion. Canelo has not lost a fight since a decision loss to Floyd Mayweather over seven years prior, including a recent stoppage victory over Billy Joe Saunders to win the WBO Title.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Vinny Pazienza vs. Gilbert Dele
programme.desc: In this episode, we see 'The Pazmanian Devil' Vinny Pazienza in front of his hometown crowd in Providence, Rhode Island, taking on undefeated WBA Super Welterweight World Champion Gilbert Dele of France. The raucous crowd was firmly in favor of its local hero, cheering him on as he looked to win his second World Title, having lost the first one to Greg Haugen three years earlier.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Miguel Cotto
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr. challenging Miguel Cotto for his WBA super welterweight title in a bout which drew 1.5 million buys. Also on the card, action from former WBC Welterweight champ Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. From the Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena in Tokyo, Japan, Show 1 features Kotoshoho, Terunofuji, Hokutofuji and Tochinoshin.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 72
programme.desc: Po finds a teddy bear in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, LaaLaa and Po excitedly show the teddy to the Tiddlytubbies and they all love it very much.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 4
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'd', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We dabble with dice, drive a digger and dance with a disco dinosaur!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: Hooper and Helping Hand are building an amazing theme park: Hooper Dooper Land! The attractions aren't ready yet but the friends are so excited that Hooper decides to open the park early.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Messy accidentally drops his jam sandwich, but why did it fall down and not up? He goes to OKIDO and rockets up to the moon to find out.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 30
programme.desc: Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 46
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 47
programme.desc: The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: It's bedtime and Bingo can't remember where she left her beloved Floppy. Retracing their steps, Bingo and Bluey lead their Mum through their bizarre day in the hope of tracking her down.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: A quick trip to the shops proves tricky for Dad, when Bingo and Bluey want to play a game of 'Kids'. Now Bluey is Mum, Bingo's her baby and for Dad however, he is a very naughty boy.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Andy Day knows young animals make great explorers. In Antarctica, a seal pup takes its first journey under the ice, and a tiny goby fish faces a huge obstacle - getting up a waterfall!

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Two T-Rexes go in search of fun. But when they get stuck in the muddy swamps, they need some help from the biggest dinosaur around.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: A little boy called Leo needs Sylvie's help performing his magic trick at show and tell.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: This episode features the zebra and the red-bellied piranha. Their wild connection is they live in large groups, increasing their chance of survival.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 20
programme.desc: The pirates find a locker washed up on the shore belonging to the legendary pirate Davy Jones. But can they find a way to get to his legendary treasure inside?

programme.desc: Happy discovers his wobbly tooth has come out, but he's lost it!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: Duggee and the squirrels help to put on an amateur dramatic show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: There has been a power cut and the squirrels use their torches to make shadows.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: After a pod of pilot whales becomes stranded at the Academy beach, the Go Jetters, with help from new teacher Professor Wave, must work fast to return them to the ocean deeps.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Go Jetters get caught up in Spain's Tomatina Festival. The Tomato Battle takes place every August in the town of Bunol, near to Valencia.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 13
programme.desc: When the Rickety Old Bridge collapses, trapping Toby and Henrietta on the other side of the ravine, inventor Ruth is asked to build a new one.

programme.desc: Sarah's hoping for a nice quiet birthday, but there's no chance once her friends arrive.

programme.desc: JoJo and Raya play snakes and ladders, but think it would be fun to make a new game.

R & D Baby Simmons is reluctant to fix the model they have, which picks up signals from her favorite lvorian soap opera, "Bridges Aflame." Over a live broadcast, Simmons must convince the cast to tie up every loose plot thread before she has to lose the signal forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 71
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, hes applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Babys cover at stake, its up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: When Tip can't win at the Boov game of Nuttypunny, her identity is challenged; Oh tries to win back Krunkle's affection with misguided help from Tip.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Chet becomes obsessed with tracking down a litterbug who is messing up the clean streets of Turbotown. // The FAST crew must compete against each other as they run a dangerous obstacle course race to save a damselfly princess who is being held captive.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: When Skrap-It gets struck by lightning, he's suddenly smart and comes up with a plan for D-Structs to remove the Dinotrux from the crater for good.on truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Wally and Wenda accompany Wizard Dustybeard on his latest archaeology expedition: finding the Lost Chamber of Magic Keys. To find the hidden chamber, the Wanderers will have to solve the key's riddles. But Odlulu is on their tail, and when she takes the Riddle Key, the Wanderers must navigate a hidden pyramid full of tricks and traps.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 23
programme.desc: The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: It's the annual Tug-of-War game in Daredale between the Pirates and the Ninjas. As the game starts the tug-of-war rope snaps. The game is cancelled until Noddy can find out who cut the rope. Using all his investigating skills and asking who, what, where, when, why and how questions Noddy follows all the clues. He discovers it was Scurvy who accidentally cut the rope.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 75
programme.desc: Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items - but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song "just for them", leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 35
programme.desc: When Scooch is selected to present a cake on the hit show, Whatever it Cakes, Tag agrees to drive him to the studio in Chew York City. But getting there will be harder than they imagined. / Lady Lydia is hosting Haturday for her family this year but she cant seem to find the feathers on her Haturday hat. Tag will help retrace her steps and Scooch will take care of the guests while they search.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 36
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Aggro, Burple and Cutter are left alone in the roost to care for some dragon eggs, but a trio of tricky Slinkwings want those eggs for themselves.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: When the Orphans start rumors that Puss has special powers, Taranis the God of Thunder asks Puss to help defeat the most powerful God of all, Toutatis

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 48
programme.desc: When Roz the boar comes to San Lorenzo to collect a bounty for capturing Puss, Pajuna tries to keep them separated before an epic fight breaks out

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 48
programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Smidge tries to rescue the Trolls after thinking she has magical powers/ DJ Suki tries to impress her favorite niece CJ Suki

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally "loses" Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang start a secret club to prepare for the Outcast offensive.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: When Meatlug accidentally ingests magnetic rocks, she becomes magnetic herself - causing destruction through the town, but ultimately helping the kids win a battle against the Outcasts.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 72
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 74
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 26
programme.desc: Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 27
programme.desc: Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: To save their family vacation, the Tucci's must "out-party" the hard-partying Breakers; When Boov-tech stops working, Oh goes off the grid.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 - EP 24
programme.desc: The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 24
programme.desc: Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or "bucking bronco", to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 76
programme.desc: Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Its Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: When Tag asks Mom to be the pilot for the upcoming Dogcaththlon race, Mom isnt sure she is ready. Until Paw reminds her of the day she saved Pawston! Mom tells the story of how she used her blimp to save the city from an eruption at the kibble factory. / Pawston is hosting a Roller Disco Night in the park, but Frank isn't allowed to attend due to last year's poor behavior. Tag convinces Mayor Sniffington to let Frank come to the party if he passes Leo's Road to Kindness.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: Its Show and Tell Day for the Race Cadets! Tag decides to talk about how she got the race flag tag on her collar, but realizes she doesnt know the real story of how she got it. Her family launches into an epic retelling of how Tag got her tag. / Spike is about to launch into space when he calls Tag in a panic to tell her that he left his special blankie behind! He cant sleep without it! Tag, Grandmaw, and Grandpaw race off to the rocket launch to try and get it back to him.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 12

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to todays markets and investors. CNBCs deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the days agenda. Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

Airing CNBCs award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Access Middle East
programme.desc: Access Middle East is your window into Middle East power, money, and influence. With exclusive interviews and high-level analysis, the program brings viewers closer to the decision-makers deploying capital and driving innovation in one of the worlds most dynamic regions.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the days session.

programme.title: Squawk Box Europe
programme.desc: Its one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang interviews JPMorgan Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon, a titan in the banking industry known for his freewheeling style, about his outlook on markets, tech and geopolitical risk.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Governments and entrepreneurs are racing to commercialize the moon. These efforts could unlock a new, deep-space economy. But to return and stay will require the highest levels of innovation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But China's dominance of the supply chain for rare-earth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Stephan Pretorious, chief technology officer of WPP, unpacks the world of generative artificial intelligence and its potential impact, both positive and negative, on marketing.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Liquid Death was founded on the idea of breaking the norms of traditional marketing. We speak to CMO Dan Murphy about the water company's origin as a "sheep in wolf's clothing."

programme.title: Quantum Marketing S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We speak with Pranav Yadav, CEO of Neuro-Insight, about the marketing intelligence his company is gleaning from neuroscience.

programme.title: Quantum Marketing
programme.desc: Lisa McKnight, Mattel's chief brand officer, has been at the forefront of reviving the iconic Barbie. Now the famous toy brand has launched itself beyond store shelves and onto the silver screen.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Power Players S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Major League Baseball Hall of Famer Cal Ripken Jr. and his brother Bill have turned youth sports into big business. But can they chase profits while preserving what's best for kids?

programme.title: Power Players S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Toronto Raptors President Masai Ujiri leads the only non-US team in the National Basketball Association, and he's spearheading an effort to take the game global.

programme.title: Power Players S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Shahid Khan owns two teams, one in the National Football League and the other in the English Premier League. He's got an ambitious playbook to boost both kinds of football around the world.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: National Women's Soccer League Commissioner Jessica Berman is presiding over a pivotal moment for women's soccer. Can she help turn astronomical growth into a sustained business?

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Americans Cash in on a Paddle-Sport Obsession. Pickleball is the hottest sport in America. In the premiere of "Next in Sports," we test the case for the paddle craze.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How Formula One Finally Hooked America. Not so long ago it was the circuits of Monaco and Monza that epitomized Formula 1. Its modern ambitions, however, are more Miami.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand New Sport. Despite Teqball being relatively unknown, the sport's creators have big plans for it. Can you build any game into a mainstream sport if you have the will and the money?

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: The American Cornhole League wants to transform cornhole from Americana staple to worldwide phenomenon.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Next in Sports explores new sports, as well as innovations in existing pastimes, illustrating what's happening around the corner and across the globe.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 6

programme.desc: Switzerland is full of advanced tech startups. We visit an inventor who makes drones do miraculous things and a company that's growing human skin in a lab.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 8

programme.title: Hello World

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city. With almost every London street having a story behind it, there are surprising revelations along the way.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on whats relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Of Greed And Ants - EP 25
programme.desc: The Hong Kong economy is booming in the 1970s. Wing Muk-tung aspires to be the master of the financial game as he approaches tycoon Tong Ho-fung. Ching Wing-chun and his buddies Chong Tai-hei and Luk Siu-fu also get involved.

programme.title: Love Virtually & What's On Today - EP 2
programme.desc: Ye Shan's marriage hits the seven-year itch. He inadvertently downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity", and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2544
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Terminals & What's On Today
programme.desc: Passengers often leave in a hurry after arrival at the airport, overlooking the unique characteristics of different airports! This show visits airports in nine countries including Japan and Switzerland, presenting them in a special light!

programme.title: Choice Husband - EP 19
programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City, but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. She gets involved in a twisted love tale between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: The X Factor Of Joy
programme.desc: Stroke, heart disease, cancer etc are all serious conditions that can lead to paralysis or even death. However, there are also patients who suffer from serious diseases and still live well. Is there a mysterious "X Factor" hidden in the body that can fight off stubborn diseases?

programme.title: Of Greed And Ants - EP 27
programme.desc: The Hong Kong economy is booming in the 1970s. Wing Muk-tung aspires to be the master of the financial game as he approaches tycoon Tong Ho-fung. Ching Wing-chun and his buddies Chong Tai-hei and Luk Siu-fu also get involved.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2545
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Global View

programme.title: Secret Door - EP 15
programme.desc: Zhong Zi Kiu and Cheung Sam Yue are childhood friends who have taken very different paths due to crimes committed by their fathers. What will come of their encounter years later?

programme.title: Your Honor - EP 5
programme.desc: Judge Song Pan Ho, an upholder of justice, and Kim Gang Heon, a ruthless gang boss, are two fathers whose lives spiral into chaos when their sons are involved in a life-altering accident. Their contrasting worlds collide, pushing them to the brink.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 34
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1939
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Call of Destiny - EP 16
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin (Carlos Chan) unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan (Hera Chan), who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite destiny?

programme.title: Moonlight Mystique - EP 17
programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Sword and Fairy 1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Adapted from game Chinese Paladin, the story follows Li Xiaoyao (He Yu), a waiter with hero dreams, and Zhao Ling'er (Yang Yutong), a descendant of Nuwa. They face challenges in search of the Spirit Pearl, courageously embark on a journey to save the world.

programme.title: Survivor's Law - EP 7
programme.desc: Four young lawyers from different backgrounds join a law firm, which is notorious for doing bad deals, to form a Hard Rock Team. ROBIN (LAM RAYMOND) is never serious about work and life. His image just does not fit those of any established law firms. CHANNING (WU, MYOLIE) is always careful at work. However, she was fired for being too emotional in handling cases. Ambitious RAYMOND (CHAN KIN FUNG, SAMMUEL) could not bear the outdated promotion system in his old company.

programme.title: Coffee Cat Mama - EP 1
programme.desc: Bar boy Bao Zhiti (Bosco Wong) divorced his wife Song Qiubo (Ivy Yeung) and took on the role of a mother. In order to get better care of his son, he often changed jobs. His roommates Su Xi (Koo Ming Wah) and Yam Ka Ching (Vincent Wong) recommended him to work in a coffee shop. Unexpectedly, he met three female owners with complicated relationships and many troubles, which changed his life. Ma Sze-Nga (Michelle Yim) is the biological mother of PIAN Kwai-Chi (Eliza Sam).

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 26
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: Herbalist's Manual, The - EP 3
programme.desc: Li Shizhen (Frank Lam) and Dong Qing (Michelle Ye) have been fascinated by herbal medicine since childhood. Unfortunately, he is already engaged to Wu Murong (Sarah Lee). Zhen originally planned to break off the engagement with Rong and confess her love to Qing after passing the imperial examination. However, when Zhen returned home after taking the examination, Qing had already agreed to the proposal of Zhen's brother (Ai Wei), so Zhen had no choice but to marry Rong.

programme.title: State Of Divinity - EP 20
programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect. However, he was taught to master the sword by a legendary swordsman Yeung. Chungs master, Kwan (Wong Wai), resented this and drove Chung away. In order to get hold of "Kwai Fa Bo Din", the book on the most powerful martial art, Kwan diverted others attention by secretly creating troubles everywhere. He was killed eventually.

programme.desc: Four young lawyers from different backgrounds join a law firm, which is notorious for doing bad deals, to form a Hard Rock Team. ROBIN (LAM RAYMOND) is never serious about work and life. His image just does not fit those of any established law firms. CHANNING (WU, MYOLIE) is always careful at work. However, she was fired for being too emotional in handling cases. Ambitious RAYMOND (CHAN KIN FUNG, SAMMUEL) could not bear the outdated promotion system in his old company.

programme.title: Coffee Cat Mama - EP 2
programme.desc: Bar boy Bao Zhiti (Bosco Wong) divorced his wife Song Qiubo (Ivy Yeung) and took on the role of a mother. In order to get better care of his son, he often changed jobs. His roommates Su Xi (Koo Ming Wah) and Yam Ka Ching (Vincent Wong) recommended him to work in a coffee shop. Unexpectedly, he met three female owners with complicated relationships and many troubles, which changed his life. Ma Sze-Nga (Michelle Yim) is the biological mother of PIAN Kwai-Chi (Eliza Sam).

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 28
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: Herbalist's Manual, The - EP 4
programme.desc: Li Shizhen (Frank Lam) and Dong Qing (Michelle Ye) have been fascinated by herbal medicine since childhood. Unfortunately, he is already engaged to Wu Murong (Sarah Lee). Zhen originally planned to break off the engagement with Rong and confess her love to Qing after passing the imperial examination. However, when Zhen returned home after taking the examination, Qing had already agreed to the proposal of Zhen's brother (Ai Wei), so Zhen had no choice but to marry Rong.

programme.title: State Of Divinity - EP 22
programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect. However, he was taught to master the sword by a legendary swordsman Yeung. Chungs master, Kwan (Wong Wai), resented this and drove Chung away. In order to get hold of "Kwai Fa Bo Din", the book on the most powerful martial art, Kwan diverted others attention by secretly creating troubles everywhere. He was killed eventually.

programme.title: State Of Divinity - EP 23
programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect. However, he was taught to master the sword by a legendary swordsman Yeung. Chungs master, Kwan (Wong Wai), resented this and drove Chung away.
